pr_title: Add notification duplicate check under Workers

timeline.message:
Add notification duplicate check under Workers

* If the same notification arrives twice, if the first notification did not end processing, the notification will be processed twice
* Keep notificationIds in memory for short time duplicates, then we rely on databse duplicate check

timeline.bodyText: This won't be present if someone decides to omit Google Play Services from their app for FireOS or Huawei build of their app. I recommend using import android.text.TextUtils instead as this is in AndroidX. Then we can use TextUtils.isEmpty instead of Strings.isEmptyOrWhitespace.
timeline.author: jkasten2

timeline.bodyText: Can we combine this logic with OneSignal.isDuplicateNotification somehow? It isn't obvious that we have two ways of checking for duplicates.
timeline.author: jkasten2

timeline.message:
Check duplicate under isDuplicateNotification

* Share memory and cache duplicate check
Remove non null annotation conflicting with kotlin
